title: Leaked Report: “CIA Does Not Know” if Israel Plans to Bomb Iran
description:
A leaked intelligence report from February says "Netanyahu probably calculates Israel will need to strike Iran to deter its nuclear program.”

The post Leaked Report: “CIA Does Not Know” if Israel Plans to Bomb Iran appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Transcripts of Kissinger’s Calls Reveal His Culpability
description:
They expose Nixon’s policymaking, Kissinger’s key role, and how so many Cambodians came to be killed by U.S. aircraft.

The post Transcripts of Kissinger’s Calls Reveal His Culpability appeared first on The Intercept.

title: U.S. Blamed the Press for Military Looting in Cambodia
description:
Any theft “was done by civilian reporters in their wandering about the village,” according to a previously unrevealed Army investigation.

The post U.S. Blamed the Press for Military Looting in Cambodia appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Notorious 1973 Attack Killed Many More Than Previously Known
description:
Long-buried documents indicate that the true number of civilian casualties in the bombing of Neak Luong may have been nearly twice the official tally.

The post Notorious 1973 Attack Killed Many More Than Previously Known appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Survivors of Kissinger’s Secret War in Cambodia Reveal Unreported Mass Killings
description:
Exclusive witness interviews and archival documents detail killings of hundreds of Cambodian civilians.

The post Survivors of Kissinger’s Secret War in Cambodia Reveal Unreported Mass Killings appeared first on The Intercept.
